input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4), 16 oz, Glass

Product keywords:
Exquisitely designed to befit the most prestigious audience
16-ounce capacity iced beverage, perfect for all beverages
The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table
Sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion
Dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended
Lead-free
Curvy shape with narrow stems
Product description:

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware has an old-fashioned look with a modern twist. The curvy shape with narrow stems gives it an elegant and charming look. It is sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion and the 16-ounce capacity iced beverage, perfect for all beverages. Made of durable, clear glass and designed to meet the needs of every occasion. The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table. Dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended. Made in the USA by Mikasa, famous for their high-quality dishware and glassware.
input_text.Response B: These beautiful glasses are perfect for serving iced tea, lemonade, or water at your next party.  The delicate design will add a touch of elegance to your table, and the classic shape will never go out of style.  Each glass holds 16 ounces of liquid, and the set of four glasses is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
